prTitle: Closes #67: fix(ci): remove console statements causing lint failures in CI pipeline

issues.title: Speaker Service: Elder speaker audit logging tests failing
issues.description: 3 test cases failing because audit logging was removed from speaker service but tests expect audit log calls

should update elder speakers with proper validation
